channel.title: Optimization on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Optimization on Blog

item.title: Simulating the Cosmos - N Body Simulation
item.description: Realtime Gravitational N-body simualtor with full OpenGL graphics pipeline accelerated with GLSL compute shader.

item.title: On Stylized Ocean Environment - Unreal Engine 5
item.description: Creating Stylized ocean environment in Unreal Engine 5 from scratch.

item.title: Image Gallery Builder - Simple Scene Building tool for OpenGL
item.description: Perform rendering optimization through batching draw calls in a Custom OpenGL Rasterization Engine using Blinn-Phong Shading model. Designed for an image gallery scene building tool.
